project_descr: To stimulate sustainable private sector led growth that benefits the poor in Nigeria

outputs.output_descr: The project will provide critical technical assistance to strengthen the capacity of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development to implement the Nigerian Agricultural Transformation Agenda.
Developing and Expanding Value Chains in Agriculture by strengthening facilities for inclusive markets.
donor_name: Support to the FAMARD Nigeria on bulding capacity to effective implement the Transformation Agenda-State Irrigation Scheme

outputs.output_descr: An expanded base of private sector-based service providers targeting business and market development for Medium, Small and Micro Enterprises, particularly through inclusive finance and entrepreneurship training at the states level.

The project is supporting the government of Nigeria, through the Bank of Industry, to expand access to renewable energy services accessible to MSMEs by facilitating renewable energy investments and increase finance options for renewable energy uptake

Access to Renewable Energy Project: This poject is supporting State Governments to expand access to renewable energy services accessible to MSMEs by facilitating renewable energy investments and increase finance options for renewable energy uptake.
The project aims to expand the base of private sector-based service providers targeting business and market development for Medium, Small and Micro Enterprises at the Federal level

Facility for Inclusive Markets seeks to catalyse the rapid scalling up of positive experiences of inclusive market approaches exercised by private and public players through advocacy alliances, knowledge management, capacity building and research.Facility for Inclusive Markets will provide knowledge and analysis on the engagement of poor and vulnerable groups in the economic process. Key outputs include: Developed and/or expanded value chains in agriculture and agro-industry, including through innovative corporate social responsibility to meet demand in domestic, regional or international markets whilst boosting productivity, value addition, employment and incomes especially in rural and peri-urban areas.

document_name: The Nigeria Agribusiness Suppliers Development Programme
